explains: v. 康复，健康好转；超过，胜过；提高……的价值；改善，变得更好
wordGroup: improve on 改进；对…加以改良
improve in 在…方面有改进
to improve the environment 改善环境
improve the comprehensive quality 提高综合素质
improve the investment climate 改善投资环境

sentences.en: I need to improve my French.
sentences.cn: 我得提高我的法语水平。

sentences.en: Don't expect it to improve overnight.
sentences.cn: 不要指望这事一下子就改善了。

sentences.en: It's never too late to improve your diet.
sentences.cn: 改善饮食什么时候都不嫌晚。
